snippet: Fletcher Cox, a third-year junior, is projected to be selected in the first two rounds.
abstract: Mississippi State defensive tackle Fletcher Cox will skip his senior season and declare for the NFL draft, where he is projected to be selected in the first two rounds.
lead_paragraph: Fletcher Cox, a third-year junior, is projected to be selected in the first two rounds.

headline.seo: Mississippi State’s Fletcher Cox Declares for N.F.L. Draft
headline.main: Mississippi State Defensive Tackle Declares for N.F.L. Draft
headline.print_headline: Mississippi State’s Cox Declares for N.F.L. Draft
